item.title: HCI
item.description: HCI Command # Introduction to BLE HCI Commands # BLE HCI commands are standardized instructions exchanged between the host and the Bluetooth controller to manage and configure Bluetooth communication. These commands enable the host to initiate various actions, such as establishing connections, configuring parameters, and managing the overall behavior of the Bluetooth device. HCI Command Structure # BLE HCI commands follow a specific structure, adhering to a standardized format that includes an HCI type, opcode, and parameters.
